```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='hide'}
library(NCStats)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
source("../../rhelpers/knitr_setup.R")
setwd("C:/aaaWork/Web/GitHub/NCMTH107/Year_Specific/W16")
d1 <- read_excel("MTH107_Grades_W16.xlsx",sheet="MT1",skip=2)
d1 <- d1[,-which(names(d1)=="")]
str(d1)
d2 <- read_excel("MTH107_Grades_W16.xlsx",sheet="Overall",skip=2)
str(d2)
```

----

# Overall Score

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.width=5, fig.height=4, par1=TRUE}
hist(~Perc,data=d1,xlab="Proportional Score",breaks=seq(0.3,1,0.05),ylim=c(0,10))
abline(v=c(0.6,0.7,0.8,0.9),lwd=2,col="red",lty=2)
text(c(0.5,0.65,0.75,0.85,0.95),9.5,c("F","D","C","B","A"))
Summarize(~Perc,data=d1,digits=2)
```

----

# Relationship with Overall Score and Quiz/HW Scores

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.width=3, fig.height=3, par1=TRUE}
plot(MT1~Quiz,data=d2,ylab="First Exam Score",xlab="Quiz Scores Prior to First Exam",pch=16,col=col2rgbt("black",0.75))
plot(MT1~HW,data=d2,ylab="First Exam Score",xlab="Homework Scores Prior to First Exam",pch=16,col=col2rgbt("black",0.75))
```

----

# Individual proportions

```{r echo=FALSE}
tmp <- select(d1,starts_with("p."))
lapply(as.list(tmp),Summarize,digits=2)
```
